name: Turtle Power!
text: You can add 1 "Turtle" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, banish 1 "Turtle" card from your GY. If this card's activation is negated or if this card is banished: You can target 1 "Turtle" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then banish 1 "Turtle" card from your GY except "Turtle Power!". You can only use each effect of "Turtle Power!" once per turn.
